mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College drew its cheerleaders from the Catholic schools for women in Memphis, Siena College and the St. Joseph School for Nursing. Team members were (L-R): Julie Ann Ready (Siena), Anita Albonetti (Siena), Barbara Garrett (St. Joseph School of Nursing), Sally Recker (St. Joseph School of Nursing), Ammon McMurray (Siena), Gigi Burford (St. Joseph School of Nursing).
